amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase the royalty rate by 16.66 percent for mineral leases in the Superior National Forest.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 115-429 to increase the royalty rate by 16.66 percent for mineral leases in the Superior National Forest.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A002) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 182 - 237 (Roll no. 642).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Grijalva.
Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A002) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 182 - 237 (Roll no. 642).

House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A002) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 182 - 237 (Roll no. 642).
